short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for Pennant Wars that calculates minimum offers for Free Agents.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When submitting a bid for a Free Agent in Pennant Wars, click on the extension icon and enter in the 4 year asking price of the Free Agent. When you click on "Get Salary", the extension will generate the minimum bids you must make depending on the years offered to the player. 

The calculations are based on the FA matrix listed in the "Help" tab on Pennantwars.com. This takes the guesswork out of the bidding process so you don't get frustrated when everyone rejects your offers!
